Related repos

  • Dashboard for SQLite databases
  • Offline documentation browser for developers
  • terminal UI for browsing and editing SQLite and CSV databases
  • WebDAV server that maps an SQLite database to a file system
  • Terminal interface for SQL databases
  • Zed editor extension experiments and tools
  • SQL client for Linux systems
  • SQL client and notebook for querying, charting, and exporting data across many databases
